name: Xtreme Sports
description: Blazing Xtreme Sports action! Test your skills in 6 hot extreme sports including bungee jumping and skysurfing. Battle to victory in intense triple even racing! Explore 5 exotic real-world locations including Mt. Kilamanjaro, Maui, and the Himalayas, with 12 multi environment tracks to choose from. Relive the action with instant replay!
